sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>false</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>true</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>change_request</collection><condition>current.state.changesTo(3) || current.state.changesTo(4) || current.state.changesTo(7)</condition><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition/><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>open change task check</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/ ) {

    // Add your code 
    checkChildTasks();

    function checkChildTasks() {
        var grChild = new GlideRecord("change_task");
        grChild.addQuery('change_request', current.sys_id);
        grChild.addActiveQuery();
        grChild.query();
        if (grChild.getRowCount() > 0) {
            gs.addErrorMessage('Can not close Change. Please close open Change Tasks first.');
            current.setAbortAction(true);
        }
    }

})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>btempleman</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2021-12-15 00:39:50</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>5479a0b32f5081101b7cf7ecf699b63e</sys_id><sys_mod_count>3</sys_mod_count><sys_name>open change task check</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_5479a0b32f5081101b7cf7ecf699b63e</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>btempleman</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2021-12-15 23:02:30</sys_updated_on><template/><when>before</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=5479a0b32f5081101b7cf7ecf699b63e"/></record_update>
